attributes.review: iâ€™m a HUUGE trump supporter (i support him the best you might say) so naturally i was very happy to see he had an app! i didnâ€™t possibly think the horrendous reviews could be true, but as others have said the app took forever to download (it took 2 weeks for me). as soon as i opened the app my eyes were bombarded by trumps nudes... i tried to click off of them because my eyes hurt when i have to squint to see minuscule things, but when i tapped the picture my phone glitched. all of my photos were deleted and replaced by disturbing and explicit pictures of our president, and all of my personal information was leaked to our government as well as the chinese government (which is confusing because i thought that was what trump was AGAINST hmm). it took me months to begin to recover from this traumatic experience, but the other day i decided to log back into the app out of love for our president. i was bombarded with recordings of trump saying blatantly racist, sexist, homophobic, and pedophilic things (worse than anything heâ€™s ever said in his speeches!) and records/pictures of him participating in jeffrey epsteinâ€™s child sex ring ðŸ˜¢ must be fake news because itâ€™s not like heâ€™s ever said anything racist or sexist or offensive ever before and itâ€™s not like thereâ€™s any proof of him being friends w jeff lol. but i feel extremely attacked and unsafe after downloading this app. i am traumatized to say the least and have no idea how such a vile thing could be created ðŸ˜¾ðŸ˜¾ðŸ˜¾
